mock_data/story_20251115_210557.wav.name: Sabrina
mock_data/story_20251115_210557.wav.text: I have never felt more connected to my roots .The story shared about our heritage fill me with pride and a sense of belonging.

mock_data/story_20251115_210557.wav.name: Community member_01
mock_data/story_20251115_210557.wav.text: I was not aware so much about our heritage.

mock_data/story_20251115_224903.wav.name: Sabrina
mock_data/story_20251115_224903.wav.text: First test memory for map feature.

mock_data/story_20251116_001050.wav.name: Sabrina
mock_data/story_20251116_001050.wav.text:
It helps me feel connected to where I come from.  
Even though I live far away now, this story reminds me that my roots are still strong.

mock_data/story_20251116_004539.wav.name: Zarina
mock_data/story_20251116_004539.wav.text: Even though I live far from home, this story makes me feel close to my people. When I see the northern lights, I remember the voices and laughter my grandparents spoke of. It reminds me that our language still lives in us, no matter where we are
